description:
Located in the Bunbury CBD, just metres from the beach and main street, the Clifton is conveniently located within walking distance of the majority of Bunbury’s many attractions.
Choose from a motel room with all the facilities for a comfortable stay and free parking outside or a character room in the historic Grittleton Lodge.

The Clifton is the perfect place to base yourself to enjoy the ocean, entertainment precinct and all Bunbury has to offer. Bunbury is a short 20-minute drive to the picturesque Ferguson Valley and 90 minutes to Margaret River.

Parking is available onsite (subject to availability) and there is also street parking next to the motel.
Parking is not allocated on this property.

Rooms offer the comfort of air conditioning and heating, tea and coffee making facilities, toaster, microwave.
plates bowls & cutlery can be put in room on request.

Please be advised full payment will be processed to the credit card supplied on the morning of arrival.

description:
Hotel Lord Forrest boasts a heated indoor pool, a fitness centre and an on-site restaurant and bar. All accommodation includes free WiFi and a private balcony.

Each room and suite offers a flat-screen TV, a minibar and tea/coffee making facilities. Some feature a spa bath or ocean views.

Hotel Lord Forrest is 10 minutes’ walk from both the Dolphin Discovery Centre and Koombana Beach. The hotel is located in the heart of the CBD, close to the Bunbury Regional Entertainment Centre, cinema, cafes and shops. It is 10 minutes' drive from Bunbury Wildlife Park and a large children's playground. Hotel Lord Forrest is also a short walk from the Marlston Hill Lookout Tower and Bunbury's Back Beach.

description:
El Quest Bunbury está situado frente a la playa de Koombana Bay y cuenta con una piscina y una pista de tenis. Todos los apartamentos disponen de TV de pantalla plana con canales por cable y películas gratuitas. Hay WiFi gratuita ilimitada.

El Quest Bunbury está a solo 500 metros del centro de Bunbury y a 300 metros del Dolphin Discovery Centre. La recepción proporciona información sobre las actividades y lugares de interés de la zona.

El establecimiento ofrece apartamentos estudio y apartamentos independientes de 1, 2 y 3 dormitorios. Los apartamentos se limpian de lunes a sábado. En la recepción se ofrecen servicios de negocios.

En las inmediaciones hay varios sitios para comer, incluidos restaurantes, donde los huéspedes pueden cargar el importe de la comida en la factura del alojamiento.

description:
Do Drop Inn 188 Clarke St east, CAREY PARK W A se encuentra en Carey Park, a 4,3 km de Hay Park Bunbury, y ofrece alojamiento con aire acondicionado y parking privado ofrece en el propio alojamiento. Esta habitación en casa particular dispone de jardín, además de salón de uso común.

La habitación en casa particular tiene TV. La habitación en casa particular también dispone de una cocina bien equipada con nevera, horno y microondas, y también hay secador de pelo.

Casuarina Boat Harbour está a 4,9 km del alojamiento, y Port Geographe Marina está a 47 km. El aeropuerto más cercano (Aeropuerto Busselton Margaret River) está a 46 km.

description:
Offering 4-star accommodation with air conditioning, Bunbury Seaview Apartments is situated in Bunbury, 2.9 km from Bunbury Entertainment Centre. Hay Park Bunbury is 3.4 km away. Free private parking is available on site.

All units feature a flat-screen TV. Some units have a balcony and/or patio with sea views. A microwave and toaster are also provided, as well as a kettle. Some units also have a kitchen, fitted with an oven, a fridge, and a stovetop. There is a private bathroom with free toiletries and a hairdryer in each unit. The apartment features free WiFi throughout the property.

Bunbury Seaview Apartments also includes an outdoor pool.

City Townhouse Bunbury es un alojamiento con vistas al jardín que está en Bunbury, a 2,9 km de Jetty Baths Beach y a 4,2 km de Casuarina Boat Harbour. Este alojamiento con aire acondicionado está a 19 min a pie de Bunbury Beach y ofrece wifi gratis y parking privado en el propio alojamiento.

La casa o chalet tiene 3 dormitorios, una cocina con nevera y lavavajillas, y 3 baños con ducha, artículos de aseo gratuitos y lavadora. Hay toallas y ropa de cama en la casa o chalet.
